div.bibl: SALONIKI, January 15, 1927The Greeks and the New Calendar.

body.p: The Greeks of Chicago, with the exception of few, eulogized the action of the Greek Government and the Church in adopting the Gregorian Calendar, which is the calendar of our adopted country and the rest of the civilized world. Nevertheless, the Greek Church of Chicago is in a dilemma, of what to do with those few who still adhere to the Julian Calendar. Of course, everything new has opposition at the beginning.
